text: I am a working- mother who does not have time to go to the gym. I was looking for a proper guide to exercise at home. I purchased the e book from 80% discount website which is legitimate. As soon as I made the payment I got an e mail and I could download the book. The content of the e book was very helpful. I am just a beginner but I already feel the difference. Thank you very much.
